name: Chris
text: (This search won't be like the others ! This time, I'll succeed !)

name: Neant
text: With your mind full of hope and imagination, you decide to start a new search.

name: Neant
text: Your friend will have interrupted your latest one, and you have just escaped the one you didn't want in the first place.

name: Neant
text: But this time will be the one.
